ERROR.general: The request could not be satisfied
ERROR.401: Authorization is not possible, has failed or has not yet been provided
ERROR.403: The server refuses to respond because the client does not have the appropriate privileges
ERROR.405: The request was made using an unsupported application method
ERROR.408: You have exceeded the time limit in returning answer
ERROR.409: The request could not be processed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource
ERROR.formato_documento_pdf: The format of the chosen file is not pdf
ERROR.error_subir_documento: An error ocurred uploading the documents, please try again.
ERROR.error_cargar_documento: An error ocurred downloading the documents, please try again.
ERROR.rol_insuficiente_titulo: The user does not have permissions
ERROR.rol_insuficiente: The user does not have sufficient permissions to use the system .
ERROR.fallo_informacion_en: There was an error querying the information about
ERROR.sin_informacion_en: No information has been found about
ERROR.persiste_error_comunique_OAS: Please return and try again later. If the error persists, contact the Technology and Information Advisory Office (Oficina Asesora de Tecnologías e Información)
ERROR.error_previsualizar_doc: The document could not be viewed, it is not a valid format, or it was not found.

proyecto.acto: Administrative act through which the academic project is created by the Higher University Council
proyecto.erro_codigo: Please enter the project code, it must contain 3 digits and numbers only.
proyecto.erro_correo: Please enter the Project Mail and the indicated format.
proyecto.erro_creditos: Please enter the Project Credits, maximum 4 digits and only numbers.
proyecto.erro_duracion: Please enter the Duration of the project, maximum 3 digits and only numbers.
proyecto.erro_unidad: Please select the unit of time.
proyecto.erro_fecha_creacion: Please complete the date and time of the record creation
proyecto.erro_fecha_vigencia: Please complete the date and time of the registration period
proyecto.erro_selec_nucleo: Please select the Core Knowledge Base!
proyecto.erro_nivel: Please select the level of training!
proyecto.erro_reso: Please enter the resolution, only number and maximum 4 digits!!
proyecto.erro_ano: Please enter the resolution year, only number and maximum 4 digits!
proyecto.erro_acto: Please enter the administrative act number!
proyecto.erro_ano_acto: Please enter the year of the administrative act!
proyecto.erro_titu_mujer: Please enter the degree awarded to a Woman!
proyecto.erro_titu_hombre: Please enter the degree awarded to a Man!
proyecto.seguro_continuar_registrar_proyecto: Are you sure you register this academic project?
proyecto.mensaje: This Module allows you to register a new academic project or create one from an academic project that has similar characteristics, in order to perform the registration you must have the evidence of the administrative act at hand, please enter the requested information.
proyecto.erro_mes_vigencia: Please enter the number of months, maximum number allowed 12!
proyecto.erro_ano_vigencia: Please enter the number of years, maximum number allowed 9!.
proyecto.mensaje_oikos: Please relate the curricular project with the physical space of the OIKOS system, if the physical space does not exist, please notify the system administrator

inscripcion.cambiar_tab: Attention! Remember to fill in the contact information found in this same tab
inscripcion.cambiar_tab2: Attention! Remember to fill in the information for your language level found on this same tab
inscripcion.cambiar_tab3: Attention! Remember to fill in the information of your registration that is in this same tab
inscripcion.error: An unexpected error has occurred while loading the information.
inscripcion.no_inscripcion: There is no registration information on record
inscripcion.aviso_programa: Select the program you wish to enroll
inscripcion.aviso_nivel: Select the level to which you want to register
inscripcion.aviso_progreso: For the registration to a project it is necessary to complete each of the information blocks that are requested 100%
inscripcion.seguro_inscribirse: Are you sure to register a new inscription with the chosen information?
inscripcion.aviso_tipo: select the type of registration you want to make
inscripcion.aviso_periodo: Period to which you will pre-register
inscripcion.error_registrar_informacion: An error happened saving the inscription information
inscripcion.error_cargar_informacion: An error happened loading the inscription information
inscripcion.mensaje_preinscripcion: To pre-register for one or more academic projects, please select the project (s) to which you wish to submit and finalize the pre-registration by pressing the Pre-registration button.
inscripcion.erro_selec: Please select at least one academic project!
inscripcion.error_proyecto_ya_existe: The academic project has already been added!
inscripcion.crear: Are you sure you want to save this information?
inscripcion.actualizar: The information has been successfully updated
inscripcion.update: Are you sure you want to update the information?
inscripcion.error_update: An unexpected error has occurred. The information could not be updated
inscripcion.error_update_programa_seleccionado: There is already a registration process with the selected program
inscripcion.info_comprobante: Fulfilling this form means the candidate has known the official admissions manual for the ACTUAL PERIOD and according with the 1571 law from 2012 authorizes expressly and unequivocally the data management according to the proper functions of the University in his condition of High Education Institution.
inscripcion.warning_info: Dear user, remember that you can only generate up to 3 receipts in pending payment status. If you want to generate another pre-registration to another project, you must pay at least one of the generated receipts.
inscripcion.alerta_preinscripcion: Applicant, in order to complete the registration process, you must fill out 100% of the required information sections.
inscripcion.alerta_posgrado: Dear applicant, keep in mind that in order to enroll in a graduate program, you must have a completed and graduated undergraduate degree, with their respective documentary supports.
inscripcion.alerta_veracidad_informacion: Applicant, please note that the information you will fill out below must be true in order to continue with the registration process.
inscripcion.alerta_discapacidades: Dear applicant, please note that the disability must be contained in the statutory law 1618 of 2013, with their respective documentary support, if you have more than one disability condition, please upload a single document in pdf format with all the necessary certifications.
inscripcion.alerta_poblacion: Applicant, if you belong to a specific type of population, please note that you must attach their respective documentary support according to Law 1448 of 2001 (single registry of victims), and Resolution 0762 of 2020 of the Ministry of Interior (certificate of self-recognition), please upload a single document in pdf format with all the necessary certifications.
inscripcion.alerta_poblacion_discapacidades: Applicant, please note that the disability must be contained in the statutory law 1618 of 2013, with their respective documentary support, also if you belong to a specific type of population please note that you must attach their respective documentary support according to Law 1448 of 2001 (single registry of victims), and Resolution 0762 of 2020 of the Ministry of Interior (certificate of self-recognition). If you have more than one disability condition or if you belong to more than one population, please upload a single document in pdf format with all the necessary certifications in the corresponding category.
inscripcion.alerta_transferencia: Applicant, remember that in order to carry out this type of procedure you must be within the dates stipulated in the curricular program of interest.
inscripcion.alerta_recibo_transferencia:
Please note the following information:

- The transfer will only be granted once (1) in the student's academic life.
- Applicants who have interrupted their studies for more than two (2) continuous or discontinuous years cannot apply for internal or external transfers.
- Re-entries, maximum term one (1) year.
inscripcion.tipo_inscripcion: Select the type of registration you wish to make
inscripcion.periodo_preinscripcion: Period for which you will pre-register
inscripcion.placeholder_ultimo_semestre: Enter the respective value in number
inscripcion.acuerdo: Student, by continuing you agree that you will be governed under the guidelines of the current reentry agreement in effect.
inscripcion.placeholder_universidad_origen: Enter the name of the university of origin
inscripcion.cantidad_creditos_aprobados: Number of credits approved and certified
inscripcion.placeholder_cantidad_creditos_aprobados: Enter the respective value in number
inscripcion.placeholder_motivo_cambio: Describe the reasons for the change request
inscripcion.placeholder_respuesta_solicitud: Select the response to the request
inscripcion.error_solicitud: An unexpected error occurred when creating the request
inscripcion.error_res_solicitud: An unexpected error occurred giving you response to the request
inscripcion.persona_ya_existe: The SGA system has found personal information related to the document number filled out!
inscripcion.info_persona_ya_existe:
In order to avoid duplication of information, the data found will be used to continue the registration process.
If you consider that the data presented does not coincide, you must make a formal request to the Technology and Information Advisory Office, which will review the veracity of the data.
inscripcion.no_hay_programa_evento: The program has not yet been assigned to a calendar or registration dates have not yet been defined.
inscripcion.no_puede_inscribirse: You can't register, the registration period has finished.
inscripcion.no_cambiar_inscripcion_solicitada: It is not possible to change the status to Enrollment Requested
inscripcion.sin_telefono: No contact number, please enter a phone number
inscripcion.mensaje_100_inscripcion: Applicant, you already have 100% of the required documentation, do not forget to press the "Register" button to continue with the process.
inscripcion.ya_existe_usuarioCorreo: The mail found does not match the one in the current session! Press ACCEPT to update it, or press CANCEL to log out and enter with the previous email.
inscripcion.generar_comprobante: If you have not saved or the receipt has not been generated, click here
inscripcion.info_impresion_auto: NOTE: A proof of enrollment document is generated upon completion of the loading bar.
inscripcion.fallo_carga_mensaje: Something failed to load information, please come back and try again
inscripcion.sin_documento: The file you are trying to view cannot be found
inscripcion.confirmar_ajuste_documentos_observacion: Confirm edition of documents with observations
inscripcion.nota_confirmar_ajuste: Currently your enrollment presents observations in some related documents, please update the unapproved documents to enable the button that confirms the edition. Don't forget to press this button or your registration status will not be updated.
inscripcion.ya_existe_registro: You already have information loaded for this field
inscripcion.informar_estado_inscrito_obs: Applicant, your enrollment is conditioned by observations in the attached documentation, please go to Registration Details to review and correct the information not approved. If you do not, you cannot continue with the process.
inscripcion.info_boton_cambio_inscrito: Do not forget to press the button "Confirm edition of documents with observations" to return to the ENROLLED status, this is enabled when you have edited all the not approved documents.

ptd.aviso_informativo_docente_p2: Keep in mind that in accordance with the provisions of article 50 of agreement 011/2022, the teachers of the career must agree with their coordinator of the curricular project and at least one (1) month in advance at the beginning of the academic period the work plan
ptd.copiar_plan_ver_docente_p2: * Do not intersect with those that have already been registered (activities registered in the current period will not be overwritten)

ptd.copiar_plan_ver_docente_p4: * Correspond to an available physical space

ptd.error_doc_docente: Please indicate the document number of the teacher.
ptd.error_no_found_docente: No teachers found with the document entered.
ptd.error_no_found_espacio_academico: No academic course were found with the code entered.
ptd.error_no_found_proyectos: The selected academic course has no projects or groups assigned.
ptd.error_no_found_preasignaciones: No pre-assignment were found for the selected period.
ptd.error_no_found_asignaciones: No assignments found for the selected period
ptd.error_codigo: Please enter the academic course code.
ptd.error_update_assign_period_spaces: The period could not be assigned to the selected groups
ptd.seleccion_periodo: Please select the period to load the data
ptd.guardado_ptd_exito: The teacher work plan assignment has been saved for the linkage
ptd.mensaje_copiar_plan: When copying the Teacher Work Plan, what has been assigned up to now will be discarded and replaced by the copy. However, the changes do not take effect until you save the changes.
ptd.mensaje_espacio_sin_periodo: The consulted academic space does not have the assigned period, please select the groups that you want to assign the academic period for the teaching pre-assignment.
ptd.espacios_no_requeridos: In the previous Teacher Work Plan, were found academic spaces that are no longer required or loaded for the current plan, these are:
ptd.espacios_sin_asignar: In the previous Teacher Work plan some spaces were not assigned, please define the missing study load for the following academic spaces:
ptd.no_info_copia_carga_lectiva: No study load for the selected period, or incomplete information
ptd.no_info_copia_actividades: No activities for the selected period, or incomplete information
ptd.pregunta_enviar_a_docente: Send for Teacher Approval? This action means that it has been approved by the Curricular Project
ptd.pregunta_enviar_a_coordinacion: Send approval to coordination? The approved academic spaces will be part of your Teacher Work Plan
ptd.pregunta_editar: Editing the preassignment requires the approval process again, Continue?
ptd.pregunta_enviar: When you send you will not be able to continue editing, continue?
ptd.info_modo_solo_ver: In this state it is not possible to edit the plan
ptd.recordar_aprobar_plan: Don't forget to pre-approve or reject the plan in the final section of this page
ptd.revisar_solapamiento_carga: Please check that there is no overlap between study load and activities. Check that the summary of the total hours coincides with what is charged in the schedule.
ptd.no_planes_particulares: No plans found for the selected period or curricular project
ptd.proyecto_sin_espacios: The Curricular Project related to the selected subject does not have defined physical spaces
ptd.generador_consolidado_info: This tool generates the consolidated automatically, but it is recommended to review and adjust if necessary.
ptd.select_periodo_proyecto: You must select the period and the academic project to save the consolidated
ptd.please_descargue_consolidado: Please generate the document to relate the teacher work plans to the present consolidated
ptd.info_firma_digital: This Teacher Work Plan will be approved and therefore digitally signed
ptd.info_agrerar_representante: If you are not the coordinator, please add yourself as a representative
ptd.info_revisar_cargar_formato: Please download, review and re-upload the "Compliance control form with current regulations"
ptd.no_valid_pre_asignacion: The academic space already has pre-assignment for the current period.
ptd.info_cambio_documento_consolidado: It's important to note that making changes to the Consolidated document's content will require restarting the approval process (changing its status to 'Not approved') and, if necessary, updating the Teacher Work Plans.
ptd.pdf_solover_excel_imprimir: Pdf document not suitable for printing or editing, please save the excel version provided.

plan_estudios.mensaje_tabla_espacios_si_vacio_solicite: User, the table shows all the academic spaces related to your curricular project, if there is no space, request its inclusion in the system.
plan_estudios.mensaje_tabla_planes_por_ciclos_indice_o: User, in the order that you add the study plans, it will be the same order in which the plan is organized by cycles.
plan_estudios.mensaje_evaluacion_plan_estudio: If the study plan meets all the defined requirements, you can approve or create an observation for the study plan in question.
plan_estudios.mensaje_tabla_evaluacion_plan_estudio: The table shows all the study plans registered in the system, you can evaluate the study plans
plan_estudios.mensaje_tabla_reporte_plan_estudio: The table shows all the study plans registered in the system, you can observe and generate the study plans in approved status

plan_estudios.seguro_cancelar: Are you sure to exit the study plan creation/edition?
